data.comment: The match is underway in San Luis de Potosi.
San Luis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in San Luis.
Atlas have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In San Luis de Potosi, Renato Ibarra (Atlas) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 5, Free kick for San Luis in the half of Atlas.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Atlas a goal kick.
San Luis to take a throw-in in Atlas territory.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to San Luis.
Atlas have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Atlas at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In the minute 9, Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Atlas in the half of San Luis.
In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a San Luis goal kick.
Atlas have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Can Atlas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Luis's half?
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Atlas.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Atlas throw-in in San Luis's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 15, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a throw-in for Atlas, close to San Luis's area.
Luciano Acosta for Atlas drives towards goal at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 18, Free kick Atlas.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Javier Correa.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to San Luis.
In the minute 21, Free kick for San Luis in the half of Atlas.
San Luis have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
San Luis have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 23, Goal kick for Atlas at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Atlas.
Throw-in for Atlas in the half of San Luis.
In the minute 25, San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a San Luis throw-in in Atlas's half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Atlas in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
In San Luis de Potosi Atlas attack through Ignacio Malcorra. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 28, It's a goal kick for the home team in San Luis de Potosi.
Corner awarded to Atlas.
Edgar Zaldivar for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 29, In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Nicolas Ibanez is booked for the home team.
Can San Luis capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atlas's half?
In the minute 33, Atlas needs to be cautious. San Luis have an attacking throw-in.
Important block from the Atlas defence as Enrique Lopez fires in a strike for San Luis.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 34, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the home team a throw-in.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 35, Goal! Mauro Quiroga (San Luis) levels the score at 1-1 with a header in San Luis de Potosi.
Great play from Nicolas Ibanez to set up the goal.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 38, German Berterame of San Luis gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
Free kick Atlas.
In the minute 39, Pablo Barrera (San Luis) gets a yellow card.
Atlas's Renato Ibarra gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards San Luis a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Atlas in the half of San Luis.
Ramiro Gonzalez (San Luis) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Atlas have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 44, Atlas's Renato Ibarra misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Atlas to take a throw-in in San Luis territory.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Throw-in high up the field for Atlas in San Luis de Potosi.
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Luis de Potosi.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Throw-in for Atlas close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Atlas.
In the minute 47, Jairo Torres is replacing Renato Ibarra for the away team.
Jairo Torres (Atlas) has received a yellow card from Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 49, Renato Ibarra (Atlas) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Atlas have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
San Luis have a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Throw-in Atlas.
Can San Luis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlas's half?
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Atlas a goal kick.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to San Luis.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
Free kick Atlas.
In the minute 56, San Luis to take a throw-in in Atlas territory.
Throw-in for Atlas in their own half.
In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 58, Hugo Nervo for Atlas has been booked by Fernando Hernandez Gomez and receives a first yellow card.
San Luis have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
San Luis are pushing forward but Nicolas Ibanez's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 60, Goal kick for Atlas at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Edgar Zaldivar for Atlas gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in San Luis de Potosi.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Atlas.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 63, Corner awarded to Atlas.
Atlas are pushing forward but Javier Correa's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a San Luis goal kick.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Atlas.
German Conti (Atlas) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
San Luis have a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Atlas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in San Luis.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 67, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Atlas throw-in in San Luis's half.
Free kick Atlas.
In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 69, San Luis's Enrique Lopez has been booked in San Luis de Potosi.
It's a goal kick for the home team in San Luis de Potosi.
Jorge Sanchez is on a sub for Juan Castro for San Luis.
In the minute 71, Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Atlas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Luis's half?
In the minute 72, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Jairo Torres.
Jairo Torres (Atlas) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Jonathan Herrera.
In the minute 76, San Luis are coming forward and Enrique Lopez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
Anderson Julio is replacing Pablo Barrera for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Jairo Torres is back on his feet again.
In the minute 79, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
Throw-in for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
San Luis have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 81, Throw-in high up the field for San Luis in San Luis de Potosi.
San Luis have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Atlas.
In the minute 83, The away team have replaced Luciano Acosta with Ignacio Jeraldino. This is the third substitution made today by Rafael Puente.
Corner awarded to Atlas.
Throw-in for San Luis in the half of Atlas.
In the minute 85, Free kick for San Luis in the half of Atlas.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 86, San Luis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
San Luis make their third substitution with Diego Pineda replacing Enrique Lopez.
Throw-in for Atlas in their own half.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 88, Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
Throw-in for Atlas in their own half.
Can Atlas capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In San Luis de Potosi, German Conti of Atlas is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Atlas have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Goal kick for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Edgar Zaldivar for Atlas who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
The away team replace Javier Correa with Brayton Vazquez.
